item.title: My First Post
item.description: Introduction This is bold text, and this is emphasized text. Visit the Hugo website!

item.title: Personal search information model
item.description: Things are actually going according to plan. Automatic indexing is up and running, and search is working, so now it’s time for a search information model. A search information model is kind of the information architecture of a search solution. The difference is that a good search engine revolves around the user more than a web page structure. You mold your information architecture to best fit your user, even if this doesn’t match the underlying architecture fully.
